summary: Comprehensive testing of coupon/discount code management feature for Paridhaan Creations e-commerce platform. All backend APIs (16/16 tests passed) and frontend UI functionality working correctly.

tests: Admin can view list of all coupons - PASS
Admin can create percentage discount coupon - PASS
Admin can create flat amount discount coupon - PASS
Admin can edit existing coupon - PASS
Admin can toggle coupon active/inactive status - PASS
Customer can apply coupon code at checkout - PASS
Customer can see discount amount displayed - PASS
Customer can remove applied coupon - PASS
Invalid coupon shows error message - PASS
Expired coupon shows error message - PASS
Coupon validation is case insensitive - PASS
Expired coupon returns 400 with error - PASS

seed_data_creation: Used existing coupons (SAVE10, FLAT100, SAVE20) from database. Created and deleted TESTUI50 test coupon during UI testing.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Coupon management feature fully functional. Backend APIs tested with pytest (16 tests). Frontend Admin Dashboard Coupons tab working with CRUD operations. Checkout page coupon application working with apply/remove/validation. Test credentials from iteration_2 still valid.
